```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(rgdal)
library(sp)
library(gapminder)
library(gstat)
```




```{r}
pollution<-read_csv("annual_conc_by_monitor_2018.csv")
```
```{r}
leaflet(data = pollution)%>% 
  addTiles()%>%
  addCircleMarkers()
```

```{r}
pollution_filtered_states<-pollution%>%filter(`State Name`=="Arkansas"| `State Name`=="Tennessee" | `State Name`=="Louisiana" | `State Name`=="Oklahoma" | `State Name`== "Texas" )
```

```{r}
pollution_filtered_states_by_parametres<-pollution_filtered_states%>%filter(`Parameter Name`=="Nitrogen dioxide (NO2)"| `Parameter Name`=="Ozone" | `Parameter Code`=="88101" & `Sample Duration`=="24-HR BLK AVG")
```


```{r}
no_2<-pollution_filtered_states%>%filter(`Parameter Name`=="Nitrogen dioxide (NO2)")

```
```{r}
ozone<-pollution_filtered_states%>%filter(`Parameter Name`=="Ozone")

```
```{r}
pm25<-pollution_filtered_states%>%filter(`Parameter Code`=="88101" & `Sample Duration`=="24-HR BLK AVG")
```

```{r}
data(no_2)
glimpse(no_2) 
class(no_2)
```

```{r}
coordinates(no_2) <- ~ Longitude + Latitude
class(no_2)
```

```{r}
bbox(no_2)
```
```{r}
hist(no_2@data$'Arithmetic Mean')

```

```{r}
no_2@data$'AMLog' <- log(no_2@data$'Arithmetic Mean')

# Histogram of new variable
hist(no_2@data$'AMLog')
```
```{r}
no_2_var.vgm <- variogram(AMLog~1, no_2)
plot(no_2_var.vgm)
```
